snippet: Talks to end tariffs on products like solar products are one way for world leaders to make some environmental progress.
abstract: Editorial expresses hope that meeting between United States, European Union, China and 11 other governments to eliminate tariffs on solar panels, wind turbines and other environmental goods may reduce cost of equipment needed to address climate change; holds that elimination of tariffs would represent significant tool in complex international task of dealing with global warming.
lead_paragraph: Talks to end tariffs on products like solar products are one way for world leaders to make some environmental progress.

headline.seo: Negotiations to End Tariffs on Environmental Goods
